ca.gedge.opgraph.util
Interface BreadcrumbListener<S,V>

Type Parameters:
S - the type of state
V - the type of value associated with a state
public interface BreadcrumbListener<S,V>

An interface for classes that want to listen to state changes in a Breadcrumb.

Method Summary
 void stateAdded(S state, V value)
          Called when a state is added to a breadcrumb.
 void stateChanged(S oldState, S newState)
          Called when the state of a breadcrumb changes.
 

Method Detail

stateChanged

                  S newState)
Called when the state of a breadcrumb changes.

Parameters:
oldState - the old state
newState - the new state

stateAdded

void stateAdded(S state,
                V value)
Called when a state is added to a breadcrumb.

Parameters:
state - the state
value - the value associated with the given state
